def start_http_server():
    # Specify the directory containing your screenshots
    screenshot_dir = os.path.abspath("LoggedData/Toshiba/Screenshot")

    # Command to start http.server on port 8000
    command = ["python", "-m", "http.server", "8000", "--directory", screenshot_dir]
    print(command)

    # Start subprocess
    try:
        subprocess.Popen(command, stdout=subprocess.PIPE, stderr=subprocess.PIPE)
        print(f"HTTP server started at {command}")
    except Exception as e:
        print(f"Error starting HTTP server: {e}")

def start_http_server():
    # Specify the directory containing your screenshots
    screenshot_dir = os.path.abspath("LoggedData/Toshiba/Screenshot")

    # Command to start http.server on port 8000
    command = ["python", "-m", "http.server", "8000", "--directory", screenshot_dir]
    print(f"Starting HTTP server with command: {' '.join(command)}")

    try:
        # Start subprocess
        subprocess.Popen(command, stdout=subprocess.PIPE, stderr=subprocess.PIPE)
        print(f"HTTP server started. Serving files from {screenshot_dir} on port 8000.")
    except Exception as e:
        print(f"Error starting HTTP server: {e}")
